title: Ruffstuff Specialties GM 2WD Saginaw Steering Box Crossover Steering Conversion Drop Pitman Arm, Using GM 1 Ton Tie Rod Ends
features: Requires steering box from GM 2WD, due to the way the arm swings
3" Drop With GM 1 Ton Drag Link Tie Rod End Taper
No Location Tabs For Sector Shaft Master Keys. This Allows Fine Tuned Steering.
description: Designed for Heavy Duty action, this kit is for the Do It Yourself techs. Can be used with High Steer adapter arms at the knuckles. Stronger than stock design to be used with GM 1-ton tie rod ends, this can be used on any vehicle as either a y-link style or crossover steering. The pitman arm does not have flat locating keys, so it can be installed at any spot on the sector shaft in relation to the center steering position.
